channel.title: Stable Diffusion on Jian
channel.description: Recent content in Stable Diffusion on Jian

item.title: Generating Anime "Art" with Stable Diffusion using the "Waifu Diffusion" Model
item.description: Recently, generating images with AI has gotten a lot of traction, so I decided to play around with it. It is easy to get it working as there is a web user interface fork of it on GitHub located here. Basically, it is working out of the box with minimal configuration needed. Instead of using the suggested model, I used the “Waifu Diffusion” model instead located here. Waifu diffusion is “a latent text-to-image diffusion model that has been conditioned on high-quality anime images through fine-tuning”.
